item.title: xue add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Our responsibility begins with our imagination." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: xue add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: xue add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: xue add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: xue add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: xue add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Taking crazy things seriously is a serious waste of time." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: xue add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Chance encounters are what keep us going." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: xue add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Time weighs down on you like an old, ambiguous dream. You keep on moving, trying to sleep through it. But even if you go to the ends of the earth, you won't be able to escape it. Still, you have to go there- to the edge of the world. There's something you can't do unless you get there." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: xue add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Narrow minds devoid of imagination. Intolerance, theories cut off from reality, empty terminology, usurped ideals, inflexible systems. Those are the things that really frighten me. What I absolutely fear and loathe." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: xue add a quote by OMAR KHAYYAM
item.description: "Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life." -- OMAR KHAYYAM

item.title: xue add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "In a place far away from anyone or anywhere, I drifted off for a moment." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: xue add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "Youth is happy because it has the capacity to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: xue add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami

item.title: xue add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: xue add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "I dream. Sometimes I think that's the only right thing to do." -- Haruki Murakami
